text: was a Japanese daimyō of the early Edo period. He served in a variety of positions in the Tokugawa shogunate, including rōjū and Kyoto Shoshidai. ==References== * Bolitho, Harold. (1974). Treasures Among Men: The Fudai Daimyo in Tokugawa Japan. title: Toda Tadamasa
